members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates an interpreter for `stripe/*` node kinds using the new RuntimeEntry + positional yield pattern.
 *
 * Config (apiKey, apiVersion) is captured in the closure, not stored on AST nodes.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link StripeClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter handling all stripe node kinds.
 */
members.name: createStripeInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * The stripe plugin definition (unified Plugin type).
 *
 * Contributes `$.stripe` with paymentIntents, customers, and charges API. Requires an interpreter provided via `defaults(plugins, { stripe: createStripeInterpreter(client) })`.
 */
members.name: stripe

members.docComment:
/**
 * Stripe client interface consumed by the stripe handler.
 *
 * Abstracts over the actual Stripe SDK so handlers can be tested with mock clients.
 */
members.name: StripeClient
request
stripePlugin

members.docComment:
/**
 * Wraps the official Stripe SDK into a {@link StripeClient}.
 *
 * Uses `stripe.rawRequest()` to send requests, preserving the SDK's built-in authentication, retries, and telemetry.
 *
 * For GET/DELETE requests, params are encoded as query string parameters on the path, since `rawRequest` only accepts body params on POST.
 *
 * @param stripe - A configured Stripe SDK instance.
 *
 * @returns A {@link StripeClient} adapter.
 */
members.name: wrapStripeSdk
